brief_title: A 6-Month Consumer Behavior Study of a Self-Management System (0803-084)(COMPLETED)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the ability of patients with intermediate risk of heart disease to appropriately use a Self-Management System.
detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 6 months.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Must be able to read and understand English without assistance. - For Males: Minimum age 45 years and Maximum age N/A (No limit). - For Females: Minimum age 55 years and Maximum age N/A (No limit). Exclusion Criteria: - Pregnant or nursing - Drug allergy
